enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The Secretariat presented the 'Implementation plan for the global observing system for climate in support of the UNFCCC,' and the Global Climate Observing System presented its activity report.
SWITZERLAND proposed that the IPCC take note of SBSTA conclusions on these matters and consider them in its Fourth Assessment Report.
Stefan Rösner (Germany) and Soobaraj Nayroo Sok Appadu (Mauritius) will co-chair a contact group on this issue.
